mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Home of Washington Illustrated. Mansion, East Front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of east front of the mansion at Mount Vernon taken from the east lawn, c. 1870. Balustrade and porch have been temporarily removed. Mounted on tan board. This stereograph is from a series of 40 views. Typically, there is a line or dash marked next to the specific numbered view on the printed list on the reverse. In this case, there is no indicator. Photograph would be either No. 17, 18 or 19. Photographed by (Alexander) Gardner, 921 Penna. Avenue, Washington, D. C. For the Ladies' Mount Vernon Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
